description: SdkServer specifies parameters for the Agones SDK Server sidecar container

grpcPort.description: GRPCPort is the port on which the SDK Server binds the gRPC server to accept incoming connections

httpPort.description: HTTPPort is the port on which the SDK Server binds the HTTP gRPC gateway server to accept incoming connections

logLevel.description: LogLevel for SDK server (sidecar) logs. Defaults to "Info"
